# Control Flow

Note: Functions taking `Tensor` arguments can also take anything accepted by
[`tf.convert_to_tensor`](../../api_docs/python/tf/convert_to_tensor.md).

[TOC]

<h2 id="Control_Flow_Operations">Control Flow Operations</h2>

TensorFlow provides several operations and classes that you can use to control
the execution of operations and add conditional dependencies to your graph.

*   [`tf.identity`](../../api_docs/python/tf/identity.md)
*   [`tf.tuple`](../../api_docs/python/tf/tuple.md)
*   [`tf.group`](../../api_docs/python/tf/group.md)
*   [`tf.no_op`](../../api_docs/python/tf/no_op.md)
*   [`tf.count_up_to`](../../api_docs/python/tf/count_up_to.md)
*   [`tf.cond`](../../api_docs/python/tf/cond.md)
*   [`tf.case`](../../api_docs/python/tf/case.md)
*   [`tf.while_loop`](../../api_docs/python/tf/while_loop.md)

<h2 id="Logical_Operators">Logical Operators</h2>

TensorFlow provides several operations that you can use to add logical operators
to your graph.

*   [`tf.logical_and`](../../api_docs/python/tf/logical_and.md)
*   [`tf.logical_not`](../../api_docs/python/tf/logical_not.md)
*   [`tf.logical_or`](../../api_docs/python/tf/logical_or.md)
*   [`tf.logical_xor`](../../api_docs/python/tf/logical_xor.md)

<h2 id="Comparison_Operators">Comparison Operators</h2>

TensorFlow provides several operations that you can use to add comparison
operators to your graph.

*   [`tf.equal`](../../api_docs/python/tf/equal.md)
*   [`tf.not_equal`](../../api_docs/python/tf/not_equal.md)
*   [`tf.less`](../../api_docs/python/tf/less.md)
*   [`tf.less_equal`](../../api_docs/python/tf/less_equal.md)
*   [`tf.greater`](../../api_docs/python/tf/greater.md)
*   [`tf.greater_equal`](../../api_docs/python/tf/greater_equal.md)
*   [`tf.where`](../../api_docs/python/tf/where.md)

<h2 id="Debugging_Operations">Debugging Operations</h2>

TensorFlow provides several operations that you can use to validate values and
debug your graph.

*   [`tf.is_finite`](../../api_docs/python/tf/is_finite.md)
*   [`tf.is_inf`](../../api_docs/python/tf/is_inf.md)
*   [`tf.is_nan`](../../api_docs/python/tf/is_nan.md)
*   [`tf.verify_tensor_all_finite`](../../api_docs/python/tf/verify_tensor_all_finite.md)
*   [`tf.check_numerics`](../../api_docs/python/tf/check_numerics.md)
*   [`tf.add_check_numerics_ops`](../../api_docs/python/tf/add_check_numerics_ops.md)
*   [`tf.Assert`](../../api_docs/python/tf/Assert.md)
*   [`tf.Print`](../../api_docs/python/tf/Print.md)
